result.eng: They took off everything I was wearing.
result.ga: Bhain siad díom a raibh umam
result.orig: Bhain siad díom a raibh umam
result.html: Bhain siad díom a raibh umamThey took off everything I was wearing.
result.ponchtml: Ḃain siad díom a raiḃ umamThey took off everything I was wearing.

result.eng: I was sweating and tired in every part of my body.
result.ga: Bhí allas liom agus tuirse i ngach ball díom
result.orig: Bhí allas liom agus tuirse i ngach ball díom
result.html: Bhí allas liom agus tuirse i ngach ball díomI was sweating and tired in every part of my body.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí allas liom agus tuirse i ngaċ ball díomI was sweating and tired in every part of my body.

result.eng: I had to remove my shoes, my belt and every piece of metal, as well as any liquids and pastes I had.
result.ga: B'éigean dom mo bhróga mo chrios agus gach píosa miotal a bhaint díom maille le pé leachtanna agus taois a bhí agam
result.orig: B'éigean dom mo bhróga mo chrios agus gach píosa miotal a bhaint díom maille le pé leachtanna agus taois a bhí agam
result.html: B'éigean dom mo bhróga mo chrios agus gach píosa miotal a bhaint díom maille le pé leachtanna agus taois a bhí agamI had to remove my shoes, my belt and every piece of metal, as well as any liquids and pastes I had.
result.ponchtml: B'éigean dom mo ḃróga mo ċrios agus gaċ píosa miotal a ḃaint díom maille le pé leaċtanna agus taois a ḃí agamI had to remove my shoes, my belt and every piece of metal, as well as any liquids and pastes I had.

result.eng: There's no chance you'd forget me when I'm away?
result.ga: Níl contúirt ort dearmad a dhéanamh díom nuair a bheas mé ar shiúl
result.orig: Níl contúirt ort dearmad a dhéanamh díom nuair a bheas mé ar shiúl
result.html: Níl contúirt ort dearmad a dhéanamh díom nuair a bheas mé ar shiúlThere's no chance you'd forget me when I'm away?
result.ponchtml: Níl contúirt ort dearmad a ḋéanaṁ díom nuair a ḃeas mé ar ẛiúlThere's no chance you'd forget me when I'm away?
